prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The prompt to edit the image with.

num_images.title: Num Images
num_images.description: The number of images to generate.

image_size.title: Image Size
image_size.description: The size of the generated image. If None, uses the input image dimensions.

num_inference_steps.title: Num Inference Steps
num_inference_steps.description: The number of inference steps to perform.

output_format.description: The format of the generated image.
output_format.title: Output Format

sync_mode.title: Sync Mode
sync_mode.description: If `True`, the media will be returned as a data URI.

enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker
enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: The same seed and the same prompt given to the same version of the model will output the same image every time.

image_urls.title: Image URLs
image_urls.description: The URLs of the images to edit.

negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: The negative prompt to generate an image from.

guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale
guidance_scale.description: The guidance scale to use for the image generation.
